fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose <up to> {one <player> to <attack at night, dealing}> three <{Basic attacks to that} player and> role<block{ing them,} and {you won't be able> to} <make {votes to> hang <people the next day, or else you'll} die {due to exhaustion th>at day}.
- **Cleave** the text in braces in your ability during the day.
- **Chop** the text in chevrons in your ability during the night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you
